communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-A copy of the employee HR file for Joy Alonzo, including any complaints, investigations or disciplinary actions filed against her 
-Any communication (emails, text messages) sent or received by Chancellor John Sharp concerning Joy Alonzo, the investigation into her public remarks about Lt. Gov Dan Patrick, the subsequent investigation into her, or the fallout from that investigation being disclosed publicly

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Wesley Lowery

title: Waco Police Department Dog Shooting July 26

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Waco Police Department Dog Shooting July 26
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Body Cam footage, incident reports, offense reports, internal memos, written reports available to me under Texas law concerning the shooting of a dog on July 26th., 2023, by the Waco PD,
at the homeless encampment around noon. Subsequent records or memos available under Texas law from Chief Victorian concerning said dog shooting, reprimands, memos, reports etc.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Body cam footage, surveillance footage, officer reports, internal memos, memos, and all files available under law for the incident that happened in Waco July 26th., 2023, involving the shooting of a dog by the Waco Police Department. This incident happened at the Homeless Camp in Waco behind WalMat around noon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
